SCTX:
Begin chapeldoorScript

short done

if (done == 1)
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 1 )

	if ( GetJournalIndex TR_MazedBand < 90  )
		PlaySound "LockedDoor"
		MessageBox "None may enter the High Chapel unless summoned by the goddess Almalexia."
	else
		set done to 1
		Activate
	endif
	


endif



End chapeldoorScript
